r.d: Gender PHP extension is a port of the gender.c program originally written by Joerg Michael. The main purpose is to find out the gender of firstnames. The actual database contains >40000 firstnames from 54 countries.
r.n: * ported new api version with partial unicode support * updated dictionary file (need to run the postinstall script) * several community bugfixes (many thanks rrichards, johannes, kalle) * Gender class is now in the Gender namespace on PHP v5.3+
